about_the_game:
This package is specially designed for beginners. It contains features such as various Upgrading Stones, XP boosters to earn experience points faster, and the bag enlargement pack to keep more items in your inventory. What’s more, players who have got bored of jumping from one quest to another can use the Quest Parchment, Seven Culvert Stones, and Mirage Pearls along with a unique mount to explore the breathtaking locations in the Nine Realms much more smoothly!

The package will automatically be transferred to your account after your purchase. To acquire it, click the “Gift” button that will appear on the top left of the screen.

Remember! You can buy this package only once per account!




Legendary Mount
  • 200% Movement Speed
  • 1 Second Mounting Time
  • For one-week use
  • Bound and untradeable

Bag Expansion
  • Add an additional row to your inventory (8 slots)
  • Bound and untradeable

Air Hammer
  • The item to unlock the slots in your gear to equip more Enchantment Stones.
  • It is unbound and tradable.

Seven Culvert Stone Package
  • You can complete the Mastery Training Quests instantly with these stones.
  • Each package contains 99 stones.
  • They are unbound and tradable.

Mirage Pearl Package
  • You can complete Help the Innkeeper quests instantly with these stones.
  • Each package contains 99 stones.
  • They are unbound and tradable.

Experience Boost Plant III
  • It provides 300% experience boost for 60 minutes.
  • It is bound and untradable.

Quest Parchment
  • It teleports you to quest locations.
  • It functions on all the maps excluding Peace Mountain, where you start the adventure.

Upgrading Stone Package
  • It contains three Level 1, Level 2, Level 3, Level 4 and Level 5 Upgrading Stones (15 stones in total)
  • It is bound and untradable.

Note: Any package you have purchased will be sent to the first server you have logged in PDO2, and will NOT be available on the other servers later on.

name: Phoenix Dynasty 2 - Starter Package

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 32/64 bit Versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium (R) D 3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 5200 128M GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 32/64 bit Versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core (TM) 2 Quad Q6700 2.66G (2 CPU) and over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9800 GT 512M GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X compatible soundcard

short_description: We’ve prepared this special package for our new players. It contains everything to boost your improvement. For instance, do you complain that your mount is too slow? Don’t worry about your experience points to upgrade your items. The package has got them all for you!
